document.full_text: former formula one world champion kimi raikkonen will make a surprise nascar debut this year while also competing in rallies, finland's turun sanomat newspaper reported on tuesday.
document.title: raikkonen planning nascar debut this year
lines_and_colors: former formula one world champion kimi raikkonen will make a surprise nascar debut this year while also competing in rallies, finland's turun sanomat newspaper reported on tuesday.
